events.name: KO:NNECT
events.text: Mentoring program that matches pre-major underclassmen with upperclassmen in the desired major. Professionally organized event to assist students with academic and career guidance while allowing to network with peer students in the same field.

events.name: General Meeting
events.text: Introduction to our student organization at the beginning of the school year. Presented our visions and goals, upcoming events, organizational structure, and officer members.
